heisig_chinese_memo: The sun and the moon are the two brightest objects in the sky.
heisig_constituent: bright, sun, day, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
heisig_story: Among nature's bright lights, there are two that the biblical myth has God set in the sky: the sun to rule over the day and the moon to rule the night. Each of them has come to represent one of the common connotations of this key word: the sun, the bright insight of the clear thinker, and the moon, the bright intuition of the poet and the seer (see frame 13).
koohiiStory1: The sun makes the moon bright.
koohiiStory2: The sun and the moon are brightest objects in the day and night, respectively.

Each of them has come to represent one of the common connotations of this key word: the sun, the bright insight of the clear thinker, and the moon, the bright intuition of the poet and the seer (see frame 13).
Chinese: The sun and the moon are the two brightest objects in the sky.
koohii1: The sun makes the moon bright.
koohii2: The sun and the moon are brightest objects in the day and night, respectively.
Meaning: bright
Story: The sun and the moon are the two brightest objects in the sky.
Kind: both

Meaning Mnemonic
The sun AND the moon are out? With both their light-powers combined, it's incredibly bright outside.
Look up at both of them, hanging out in the sky together. Make them super bright, so bright you have to shield your eyes.
Reading Mnemonic
When do things start to get bright outside? I'd say when things start getting sunny, and that is the month of May (ã‚ã„).
If your months don't match up with this too well (if you're down in the southern hemisphere, for example) then you'll have to imagine all this up in the Northern Hemisphere. Sorry about that, South Hemisphere ladies and gents.
